title: Seeing how much damage I can do after I ult as Illaoi

replies.body:
Me holding my ult for the perfect moment as {{champion:420}}
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XCawU6BE8P8
What did I just watch?! {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} Also: TAKE THE UPVOTE!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=65esbox6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-10T19:21:52.948+0000)
>
> Me holding my ult for the perfect moment as {{champion:420}}
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XCawU6BE8P8

That escalated WAY too quickly.
Thats what happens when Illaoi ults
Aight, you don't have to take time of your schedule to comment here for 2016. Nothing could best this.
That's it, I'm done, never commenting again.... wait..
The Indiana Jones reference made it perfect

You mean you kill dozens of innocent people by blowing up their heads from their necks and subdue them by frying their brains?

Sounds like DJ Sona to me.
So I guess Indiana Jones is Kayle?
I never get to do damage when I ult as Illaoi, because the second they hear the sound of my ult all focus gets swapped to me and I get murdered before I can even W

> [{quoted}](name=DErpMAstEr651,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=65esbox6,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-01-11T04:19:31.983+0000)
>
> I never get to do damage when I ult as Illaoi, because the second they hear the sound of my ult all focus gets swapped to me and I get murdered before I can even W

I feel sad when I get silenced after I ult.
{{champion:16}} is a harsh mistress.
And I still think that she needs a buff.
The release of {{champion:420}} was an indirect buff to Urgot. He's no longer the ugliest champ in the game.

The other day an Illaoi on our team 1 vs 3 at the dragon pit, and won with low health. 

Seeing her is equally awesome and terrifying.
